|--------------------------------------|
|             Marked Inst              |
|--------------------------------------|
|               t1 = 10                |
|       brif t1, block2, block3        |
|               t3 = 10                |
|               t4 = 10                |
|     phi t5, block2 t3, block3 t4     |
|            t6 = add t5 10            |
|                ret t6                |
